languages.text: "Я лишь исполняю обязанности, возложенные на меня званием Наместника. Силы династии Чорда спешно ретировались, и, как это ни удивительно, на станции еще остались неучтенные подонки, поспешившие воспользоваться ситуацией. Самых толковых и полезных я взял под крыло и велел не шалить. Другие... Пришлось приписать к траурному счету, выставленному нам госпожой Чорда, еще сотню имен".

"I'm only carrying out the duties imposed upon me by my position as Liege. After the House Chorda forces retreated in a hurry, it turned out that, surprisingly enough, there were unaccounted-for scumbags on the station who wasted no time in seizing the opportunity. I took the smartest and most useful among them under my wing, and told them I didn't want any shenanigans. As for the rest... a hundred or so names were added to the grievous toll Lady Chorda had left behind."
languages.original_text: "Я лишь исполняю обязанности, возложенные на меня званием Наместника. Силы династии Чорда спешно ретировались, и, как это ни удивительно, на станции еще остались неучтенные подонки, поспешившие воспользоваться ситуацией. Самых толковых и полезных я взял под крыло и велел не шалить. Другие... Пришлось приписать к траурному счету, выставленному нам госпожой Чорда, еще сотню имен".

traits.locale_text: "I'm only doing the duties imposed upon me by my position as a Liege. After the House Chorda forces retreated in a hurry, it turned out that, surprisingly enough, there were unaccounted-for scumbags at the station who wasted no time in grabbing the opportunity. I took the smartest and most useful among them under my wing and told them I didn't want any shenanigans. As for the rest... A hundred or so names had to be added to the grievous toll Lady Chorda had left behind."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “我仅仅是在履行身为总督的职责罢了。库尔达家族的军队匆忙撤退之后，出乎我意料，这座星站里居然还剩下一大群藏起来的人渣，不失时机地抓住了这个机会。于是我把这群人之中最聪明、最有用的人收编到了我的手下，告诉他们我不喜欢有人和我耍花招。至于剩下的人……恐怕又死了一百多个人，这笔账都可以算在库尔达女士头上。”
languages.original_text: "I'm only carrying out the duties imposed upon me by my position as Liege. After the House Chorda forces retreated in a hurry, it turned out that, surprisingly enough, there were unaccounted-for scumbags on the station who wasted no time in seizing the opportunity. I took the smartest and most useful among them under my wing, and told them I didn't want any shenanigans. As for the rest... a hundred or so names were added to the grievous toll Lady Chorda had left behind."

traits.locale_text: “我仅仅是在履行身为总督的职责罢了。库尔达家族的军队匆忙撤退之后，出乎我意料，这座星站里居然还剩下一大群藏起来的人渣，不失时机地抓住了这个机会。于是我把这群人之中最聪明、最有用的人收编到了我的手下，告诉他们我不喜欢有人和我耍花招。至于剩下的人……恐怕又死了一百多个人，这些人都可以算在库尔达女士的头上。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「私は領主としての任務を果たしているだけだ。チョーダ軍が慌てて退却した時、驚くべきことに、ステーションに在籍不明の卑劣な連中がいたことが判明した。その中で一番頭の切れる使える奴を引き抜き、悪ふざけは止めるように言った。残りは…レディ・チョーダが残した痛ましい犠牲者数に、100人以上の名前が追加された」
languages.original_text: "I'm only carrying out the duties imposed upon me by my position as Liege. After the House Chorda forces retreated in a hurry, it turned out that, surprisingly enough, there were unaccounted-for scumbags on the station who wasted no time in seizing the opportunity. I took the smartest and most useful among them under my wing, and told them I didn't want any shenanigans. As for the rest... a hundred or so names were added to the grievous toll Lady Chorda had left behind."

traits.locale_text: 「私は領主としての任務を果たしているだけだ。チョーダ軍が慌てて退却した時、驚くべきことに、ステーションに在籍不明の卑劣な連中がいたことが判明した。その中で一番頭の切れる使える奴を引き抜き、悪ふざけは止めるように言った。残りは…レディ・チョーダが残した痛ましい犠牲者数に、100人以上の名前が追加された」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Solo cumplo con las obligaciones que me impone mi cargo de Señor. Después de que las fuerzas de la casa Chorda se retiraran a toda prisa, unos desgraciados en la estación no perdieron el tiempo en aprovechar la oportunidad. Me hice cargo de los más inteligentes y les dije que pasaba de artimañas. En cuanto al resto... Un centenar de nombres tuvieron que ser añadidos al doloroso rastro que había dejado Lady Chorda».
languages.original_text: "I'm only carrying out the duties imposed upon me by my position as Liege. After the House Chorda forces retreated in a hurry, it turned out that, surprisingly enough, there were unaccounted-for scumbags on the station who wasted no time in seizing the opportunity. I took the smartest and most useful among them under my wing, and told them I didn't want any shenanigans. As for the rest... a hundred or so names were added to the grievous toll Lady Chorda had left behind."

traits.locale_text: «Solo cumplo con las obligaciones que me impone mi cargo de Señor. Después de que las fuerzas de la casa Chorda se retiraran a toda prisa, unos desgraciados en la estación no perdieron el tiempo en aprovechar la oportunidad. Me hice cargo de los más inteligentes y les dije que pasaba de artimañas. En cuanto al resto... Un centenar de nombres tuvieron que ser añadidos al doloroso rastro que había dejado Lady Chorda».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Ich erfülle lediglich die Pflichten, die meine Position als Lehnsherr mit sich bringen. Nach dem überstürzten Rückzug der Truppen von Haus Chorda hat sich gezeigt, dass es überraschenderweise noch unentdeckten Abschaum auf der Station gab, der die Gelegenheit sofort beim Schopf ergriffen hat. Ich habe die Klügsten und Nützlichsten davon unter meine Fittiche genommen und ihnen gesagt, dass ich keinen Unfug dulde. Und die übrigen ... Um die einhundert Namen wurden der langen Liste der Opfer hinzugefügt, die Lady Chorda zurückgelassen hatte."
languages.original_text: "I'm only carrying out the duties imposed upon me by my position as Liege. After the House Chorda forces retreated in a hurry, it turned out that, surprisingly enough, there were unaccounted-for scumbags on the station who wasted no time in seizing the opportunity. I took the smartest and most useful among them under my wing, and told them I didn't want any shenanigans. As for the rest... a hundred or so names were added to the grievous toll Lady Chorda had left behind."

traits.locale_text: "Ich erfülle lediglich die Pflichten, die meine Position als Lehnsherr mit sich bringen. Nach dem überstürzten Rückzug der Truppen von Haus Chorda hat sich gezeigt, dass es überraschenderweise noch unentdeckten Abschaum auf der Station gab, der die Gelegenheit sofort beim Schopf ergriffen hat. Ich habe die Klügsten und Nützlichsten davon unter meine Fittiche genommen und ihnen gesagt, dass ich keinen Unfug dulde. Und die übrigen ... Um die einhundert Namen mussten der langen Liste der Opfer hinzugefügt werden, die Lady Chorda zurückgelassen hatte."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Je ne fais que m'acquitter des devoirs qui m'incombent en tant que suzerain. Après que les forces de la maison Chorda ont battu en retraite, un bon nombre de malfrats sont sortis de leurs trous pour essayer de profiter de l'occasion. J'ai pris les plus malins et les plus utiles sous mon aile, en leur faisant comprendre qu'ils avaient intérêt à bien se tenir. Quant aux autres... Une centaine de noms a dû être ajoutée à la longue liste de victimes de dame Chorda. »
languages.original_text: "I'm only carrying out the duties imposed upon me by my position as Liege. After the House Chorda forces retreated in a hurry, it turned out that, surprisingly enough, there were unaccounted-for scumbags on the station who wasted no time in seizing the opportunity. I took the smartest and most useful among them under my wing, and told them I didn't want any shenanigans. As for the rest... a hundred or so names were added to the grievous toll Lady Chorda had left behind."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne fais que m'acquitter des devoirs qui m'incombent en tant que suzerain. Après que les forces de la maison Chorda ont battu en retraite, un bon nombre de malfrats sont sortis de leurs trous pour essayer de profiter de l'occasion. J'ai pris les plus malins et les plus utiles sous mon aile, en leur faisant comprendre qu'ils avaient intérêt à bien se tenir. Quant aux autres... Une centaine de noms a dû être ajoutée à la longue liste de victimes de dame Chorda. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Emîr olarak üzerime düşen vazifeleri yerine getiriyorum, o kadar. Chorda Hanesi alelacele ricat ettikten sonra şaşılır ki geride gözden kaçırdığımız birkaç şerefsiz bırakmış. Bunlar da fırsatı bulunca hiç vakit kaybetmemiş. Hepsini tespit edip aralarındaki en akıllı ve işe yarar olanları maiyetime aldım. Uyanıklık etmemeleri için de iyice tembihledim. Kalanlara gelirsek... Leydi Chorda'nın geride bıraktıkları arasına yüz küsur isim daha eklendi."
languages.original_text: "I'm only carrying out the duties imposed upon me by my position as Liege. After the House Chorda forces retreated in a hurry, it turned out that, surprisingly enough, there were unaccounted-for scumbags on the station who wasted no time in seizing the opportunity. I took the smartest and most useful among them under my wing, and told them I didn't want any shenanigans. As for the rest... a hundred or so names were added to the grievous toll Lady Chorda had left behind."

traits.locale_text: "Emîr olarak üzerime düşen vazifeleri yerine getiriyorum, o kadar. Chorda Hanesi alelacele ricat ettikten sonra şaşılır ki geride gözden kaçırdığımız birkaç şerefsiz bırakmış. Bunlar da fırsatı bulunca hiç vakit kaybetmemiş. Hepsini tespit edip aralarındaki en akıllı ve işe yarar olanları maiyetime aldım. Uyanıklık etmemeleri için de iyice tembihledim. Kalanlara gelirsek... Leydi Chorda'nın geride bıraktıkları arasına yüz küsür isim daha eklendi."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
